biotools.summary: TcoF is a database that facilitates the exploration of proteins involved in the regulation of transcription in humans by binding to regulatory DNA regions (transcription factors) and proteins involved in the regulation of transcription in humans by interacting with transcription factors and not binding to regulatory DNA regions (transcription co-factors). Proteins can be searched by a variety of identifiers or predefined sets of proteins can be viewed.
